price: Tazama jinsi wanavyo kupigia mifano. Basi wamepotea, wala hawataiweza Njia.
arabic: ٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ ضَرَبُواْ لَكَ ٱلۡأَمۡثَٰلَ فَضَلُّواْ فَلَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ سَبِيلٗا
footnotes: Hebu angalia, ewe Nabii! Vipi wanavyo kupigia mifano hawa! Mara wanakupigia mfano wa mwenye kurogwa, mara nyengine kuwa ati ni mwendawazimu, mara ya tatu kuwa ni mwongo, na mara yane kuwa unaipokea Qur'ani kutokana na wasio kuwa Waarabu. Hao kwa hayo hakika wameipotea njia ya haki, na kuhojiana kulio sawa. Basi hawaitambui njia ya kufikilia yote hayo.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: unẓur kayfa ḍarabū laka al-amthāla faḍallū falā yastaṭīʿūna sabīlan
